dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I'd suggest engaging in small talk or discussing a topic of common interest to avoid raising suspicion. For instance, "Hey Charlie, have you seen any good movies lately? Alice, what do you think about the new restaurant downtown?"
